ModMetaData.name: RemoteDoors
ModMetaData.author: TGPArcher
ModMetaData.description: This mod adds remote technologies such as: * Remote Controller - an controller which can acces other remote objects and acctivate their functionality - section: Misc - research required: MicroelectronicsBasics * Remote Door - a new type of door which can be opened or closed only by the remote controller - section: Structures - research required: Autodoors * Remote Embrasure - a new type of wall with an embrasure, it is closed by default but when activated by a remote controller it opens and you can shoot through - section: Structures - research required: Autodoors
